main.name: Dominic Herriott
main.description: , specialising in data engineering and analytics.
main.bio: Management consultant specialising in data engineering and analytics. Experienced in leading teams, and working as part of a team, to design and deliver technical solutions for complex business problems. Have worked across multiple sectors and industries, and excelled working in high pressure environments delivering to tight deadlines.

education.description: Specialised in the computational modelling of electrons within newly discovered superconducting materials.
Completed A-Levels in Maths, Further Maths, Physics and Chemistry

work.title: Management Consultant
work.description: Joined as a graduate within the Strategy and Analytics Consulting practice and have worked on multiple business critical projects across industries. This has included building production-grade cloud based solutions to help solve business problems and provide key reporting to C-suite executives.

work.title: Researcher
work.description: Materials Science researcher in the New Product Technology division. Used experimental and statistical techniques to gain new insights and develop research reports. These were then used to inform and aid development of new Dyson products.
